nodes.text: The firethorn tree was a species of tree found on Abbaji.
The trees grew only in a single, small grove of the Irugian Rain Forest, and could reach over a hundred meters in height.

Tiny versions were owned by the rich across the galaxy as heirlooms. These were worth a decamillion credits. Xizor had a 600-year-old specimen given to him by a former rival to make amends. It was only trimmed once a year, with one small cut per trim.
